title: SNP minister: Independent Scotland will join EU even if it means hard border with England
text:
An independent Scotland would join the EU regardless of whether this leads to a hard border with England, the SNP's Constitutional Affairs Minister has said.

Mike Russell told a fringe event at the SNP conference in Aberdeen that the party's longstanding policy of a separate Scotland becoming an EU member state would not be reconsidered to take account of Brexit.

He said Scotland's EU membership would then define its relationship with the remainder of the UK, including whether checks would be required at the English border.
